features: ●【Quality Service】: If you have any questions about the product, please feel free to contact us. Our service team will provide you with a satisfactory solution within 24 hours.

●【iPhone Charger Fast Charging】: iPhone charger cable is made of high purity copper core and intelligent smart chip with overcharge protection, current stabilization protection, automatic switching and battery protection, which can support up to 2.4A fast charging and 480 Mbps transmission speed.

●【Apple MFi Certification】: Apple MFi certified Lightning Cable is guaranteed not to pop up warning messages, ensuring your Lightning devices load and charge safely and quickly at the fastest possible speed.

●【iPhone Cable Nylon Braided Layer】: The iPhone charging cable is designed with a reinforced connector that has been tested to over 10,000 bends for extra protection and durability. The braided nylon insulation and precision layered welded connectors make this cable more durable and stronger than regular iPhone charger cables, while being flexible and tangle-free. Withstands daily connection needs and long-term use.

● 【iPhone Perfect Compatibility】: iPhone charger cable MFi certified with iPhone 13/12/11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS/XS Max/XR/X/8 Plus/8/7 Plus/7/Sync 6s Plus/6s/6 Plus/6/5s/5c/5/Air 2/ mini/mini 2/mini 4 etc. compatible. 3 iPhone charging cables, extra long 10 feet, convenient to charge your device in bedroom, couch, office, back seat of car, travel

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Made of high-quality materials Superior craftsmanship is mainly the use of superior materials. This charging cable uses high-purity and thicker copper wire, which makes the transmission and charging more stable. For iPhones, stable charging is very beneficial to battery life. Fast charging and transferring data To reduce cable resistance and increase charging speed, high-quality four-core copper wire is used internally, so in most cases, your device can charge at 2.4 amps and transfer files at 480Mbps. Sturdy and wear-resistant This charging cable is covered with nylon braided fiber material, which makes it stronger and more durable. Not easily damaged when pulled, folded, bent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are so cheap especially for a pack of 3! They are the perfect length for me. They don’t seem flimsy at all. It charges my iPhone well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars iPhone Charger 3-Pack: Because One Cord is SO Last Season!
reviews.reviewText: Move over, Apple-provided charging cord – there's a new trio in town, and they're like the Avengers of the charging world! I present to you the iPhone Charger 3-Pack: 10 feet of braided magnificence that's not just a charging cable; it's a lifestyle choice.Let's start with the quality – these cables are so durable, I'm convinced they moonlight as superhero capes when I'm not looking. They've outlasted the Apple-provided cord by months, and I've put them through more twists and turns than a daytime soap opera. If charging cables had a Hall of Fame, these bad boys would be front and center, wearing tiny charging capes.Now, the length – 10 feet of charging freedom! I've got one in the car, one at the office (where my boss thinks I'm working but really just charging my phone), and one in my home office, where I'm the self-appointed CEO of procrastination. No more acrobatics trying to reach an outlet; I can practically charge my phone from the neighbor's house.And the price – a true steal! I would've willingly forked over $10 for just one of these charging champs, but the universe smiled upon us and said, "Why settle for one when you can have three?" It's like a charging cable Black Friday deal that lasts all year round. I'm half-expecting a fireworks display and confetti every time I plug in my phone.In conclusion, if you're still rocking a single charging cable, it's time to step into the future with the iPhone Charger 3-Pack. Quality that outlasts relationships, length that defies spatial limitations, and a price that's practically begging you to treat yourself. Consider my charging game officially upgraded – one cable for every occasion, and a spare to share with my phone-less friends. 10 feet of freedom, folks – 10 feet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love how long and how long lasting these are
reviews.reviewText: When my Dad was in the hospital he struggled with charging his phone and being able to use it on his own. The longest chord I could get him at the time was 6 ft, and it barely reached his side table when he was in his chair and he struggled to be able to charge his phone while he was in bed. When I saw these I bought them and I keep a spare one unused in case my Dad ends up back in the hospital (he has a lot of health concerns). I also use one in my office where the outlet is a bit of a stretch from my desk, so this way I can charge my phone and still have it next to me. My Mom also has a tendency to let a bunch of chords get tangled together and often damages phone chords, but so far this one has continued going strong for her. Definitely would recommend these, they are so convenient and work really well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These chargers seem durable and are very long. I’ve been using them for about 2 months so far. The color is very pretty too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great, can fray
reviews.reviewText: The long length is so helpful!! Charges fast, and seemed pretty durable at first. However after about 6 months one began to fray, and this has affected connectivity and it sometimes doesn’t work. I didn’t even use it heavily. At least there are backups, but it should last longer than that especially with the light use I subjected it to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Some cords don’t last very long. This one does.
reviews.reviewText: iPhone cords are essential to keep your phone charged, and some of them are not reliable. Fortunately this one is and has been, also love that you can buy multiple cords.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: No iPhone errors popped up, cord is long, seems sturdy, happy with 3 to a pack for this price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cord length is great. Problem is one of the cables has stopped working. I don’t think its quality is good and that’s why I waited a little while before I wrote a review. I wanted to know if the cables would have good endurance.
